articles.title: ‘Surprisingly resilient’: IMF lifts global growth forecasts - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Fund says demand in the US and Europe has been stronger than expected, and that only the UK faces a recession.
articles.content: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has raised its 2023 global growth outlook slightly due to surprisingly resilient demand in the United States and Europe and the reopening of Chinas economy after… [+4956 chars]

articles.title: Irish economy grew by 12.2% last year despite price squeeze and slowdown internationally - The Irish Times
articles.description: Latest flash estimate from Central Statistics Office was significantly ahead of expectations and made Ireland the fastest-growing economy in Europe
articles.content: The Irish economy grew by a better-than-expected 12.2 per cent last year despite a severe cost-of-living squeeze and a significant slowdown in the global economy. This was significantly ahead of Gove… [+3895 chars]

articles.title: The Comet Interceptor probe could visit a stunning object like the green C/2022 E3 (ZTF) - Space.com
articles.description: If Europe's Comet Interceptor mission were already in space, Comet C/2022 E3 (ZTF) would make a tempting target.
articles.content:
Comet C/2022 E3 (ZTF) is tantalizing to spot through a telescope, but what would it look like up close?
Scientists don't have a way to get a spacecraft to the stunning green comet
